categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Bounty Hunters 14 is the fourteenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli and Arif Prianto, and published by Marvel Comics on July 7, 2021.

"THE FOLLOWING" Hunted by the mysterious assassin
DEATHSTICK, a wounded VALANCE and his reluctant partner
DENGAR are running out of options! T'ONGA is outgunned and
outnumbered…but she does have one last surprise up her
sleeve! And the shadowy force behind all of the danger makes
its move!

In the Siege of Mandalore flashback, Rex is wearing a Phase II clone trooper armor helmet with a standard visor, when other media depict his Phase II helmet with a customized visor shaped like that of a Phase I helmet.
